peeragogical-action-review.title: Peeragogy Progress PAR 1 (2012)
peeragogical-action-review.intention-review: We want to run a MOOC to codesign a new way of learning together online.
peeragogical-action-review.what-happened: We develop an outline syllabus and budget, and submit our proposal to the Knight Foundation.
peeragogical-action-review.what-happened-perspectives: The details of the syllabus are meant to be worked out with students when they arrive, which is somewhat confusing; the tasks and budget are more concrete.
peeragogical-action-review.learnings-changes: We have a budget breakdown for how we would spend $50,000.
